Title: The Burglar's Dilemma
Actors: Lionel Barrymore, Henry B. Walthall, Robert Harron
Plot: In this latter day Cain and Abel story, a jealous brother strikes down his sibling just as a young burglar is about to enter the house. The jealous brother summons police, who then charge the young intruder with murder. How can the burglar prove his innocence?
